 3644:          %% Terminations
 3645:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 3646:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3647:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 3648:                            ok
 3649:                    end},
 3650:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 3651:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 3652:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 3653:                                ok ->
 3654:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 3655:                                    {ok, State1};
 3656:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3657:                                    ERROR
 3658:                            end
 3659:                    end},
 3660:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 3661:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3662:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 3663:                            ok
 3664:                    end},
 3665:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 3666:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 3667:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 3668:                                ok ->
 3669:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 3670:                                    {ok, State1};
 3671:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3672:                                    ERROR
 3673:                            end
 3674:                    end},
 3675: 
 3676: 
 3677:          %% *** We are done ***
 3678:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3679:         ],
 3680: 
 3681:     i("start server evaluator"),
 3682:     ServerInitState = InitState,
 3683:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 3684: 
 3685:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 3686:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 3687:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 3688: 
 3689:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 3690:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 3691:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 3692:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3693: 
 3694:     i("await evaluator"),
 3695:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 3696:     
 3697: 
 3698: 
 3699: traffic_snr_tcp_client_start(Node) ->
 3700:     Self = self(),
 3701:     Fun  = fun() -> traffic_snr_tcp_client(Self) end,
 3702:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 3703: 
 3704: traffic_snr_tcp_client(Parent) ->
 3705:     {Sock, ServerSA, Path} = traffic_snr_tcp_client_init(Parent),
 3706:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 3707:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
 3708:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
 3709:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
 3710:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock),
 3711:     Reason = traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
 3712:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_close(Sock, Path),
 3713:     exit(Reason).
 3714: 
 3715: 
 3716: traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock) ->
 3717:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, send) of
 3718:         {ok, stop} -> % Breaks the loop
 3719:             ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ok),
 3720:             ok;
 3721:         {ok, Data} ->
 3722:             case socket:send(Sock, Data) of
 3723:                 ok ->
 3724:                     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ok),
 3725:                     traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock);
 3726:                 {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3727:                     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ERROR),
 3728:                     exit({send, Reason})
 3729:             end;
 3730:         {error, Reason} ->
 3731:             exit({await_continue, Reason})
 3732:     end.
 3733: 
 3734: traffic_snr_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
 3735:     put(sname, "rclient"),
 3736:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 3737:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 3738:     {ServerSA, Proto} = traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
 3739:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 3740:     Sock     = traffic_snr_tcp_client_create(Domain, Proto),
 3741:     Path     = traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind(Sock, Domain),
 3742:     {Sock, ServerSA, Path}.
 3743: 
 3744: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
 3745:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start -> entry"),
 3746:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 3747: 
 3748: traffic_snr_tcp_client_create(Domain, Proto) ->
 3749:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_create -> entry"),
 3750:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 3751:         {ok, Sock} ->
 3752:             Sock;
 3753:         {error, Reason} ->
 3754:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 3755:     end.
 3756: 
 3757: traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 3758:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind -> entry"),
 3759:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3760:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3761:         ok ->
 3762:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 3763:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
 3764:                     Path;
 3765:                 {ok, _} ->
 3766:                     undefined;
 3767:                 {error, Reason1} ->
 3768:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
 3769:             end;
 3770:         {error, Reason} ->
 3771:             exit({bind, Reason})
 3772:     end.
 3773: 
 3774: traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 3775:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 3776: 
 3777: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 3778:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue -> entry"),
 3779:     ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan).
 3780: 
 3781: traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
 3782:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect -> entry"),
 3783:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
 3784:         ok ->
 3785:             ok;
 3786:         {error, Reason} ->
 3787:             exit({connect, Reason})
 3788:     end.
 3789: 
 3790: traffic_snr_tcp_client_close(Sock, Path) ->
 3791:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_close -> entry"),
 3792:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 3793:         ok ->
 3794:             unlink_path(Path),
 3795:             ok;
 3796:         {error, Reason} ->
 3797:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
 3798:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 3799:             unlink_path(Path),
 3800:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 3801:     end.
 3802: 
 3803: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 3804:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate -> entry"),
 3805:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 3806:         ok ->
 3807:             ok;
 3808:         {error, Reason} ->
 3809:             Reason
 3810:     end.
 3811: 
 3812:

 3815: %% This test case is intended to test that the send and recv functions
 3816: %% by repeatedly sending a meassage between two entities.
 3817: %% The same basic test case is used for three different message sizes; 
 3818: %% small (8 bytes), medium (8K) and large (8M).
 3819: %% The message is sent from A to B and then back again. This is 
 3820: %% repeated a set number of times (more times the small the message).
 3821: %% This is the 'small' message test case,
 3822: %% for TCP and IPv4.
 3823: 
 3824: traffic_ping_pong_small_send_and_recv_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3825:     ?TT(?SECS(15)),
 3826:     Msg = l2b(?TPP_SMALL),
 3827:     Num = ?TPP_NUM(Config, ?TPP_SMALL_NUM),
 3828:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3829:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3830:            fun() ->
 3831:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3832:                                  proto  => tcp,
 3833:                                  msg    => Msg,
 3834:                                  num    => Num},
 3835:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)
 3836:            end).

 4184:                    has_support_sctp(),
 4185:                    is_old_fedora16(),
 4186:                    is_slow_ubuntu(Config),
 4187:                    traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond()
 4188:            end,
 4189:            fun() ->
 4190:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 4191:                                  proto  => sctp,
 4192:                                  msg    => Msg,
 4193:                                  num    => Num},
 4194:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)
 4195:            end).

 4199: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4200: %% This test case is intended to test that the send and recv functions
 4201: %% by repeatedly sending a meassage between two entities.
 4202: %% The same basic test case is used for three different message sizes; 
 4203: %% small (8 bytes), medium (8K) and large (8M).
 4204: %% The message is sent from A to B and then back again. This is 
 4205: %% repeated a set number of times (more times the small the message).
 4206: %% This is the 'large' message test case,
 4207: %% for SCTP and IPv6.
 4208: 
 4209: traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_sctp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4210:     ?TT(?SECS(60)),
 4211:     Msg = l2b(?TPP_LARGE),
 4212:     Num = ?TPP_NUM(Config, ?TPP_LARGE_NUM),
 4213:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4214:            fun() ->
 4215:                    has_support_ipv6(),
 4216:                    has_support_sctp(),
 4217:                    is_old_fedora16(),
 4218:                    is_slow_ubuntu(Config)
 4219:            end,
 4220:            fun() ->
 4221:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
 4222:                                  proto  => sctp,
 4223:                                  msg    => Msg,
 4224:                                  num    => Num},
 4225:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)
 4226:            end).

 4229: 
 4230: %% This test case is a bit extreme and fails on some hosts
 4231: %% (e.g. OpenIndiana Hipster), so exclude them.
 4232: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond() ->
 4233:     traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
 4234: 
 4235: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond({unix, sunos}, _) ->
 4236:     skip("TC does not work on platform");
 4237: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond({unix, linux}, _) ->
 4238:     traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2(string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")));
 4239: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond(_, _) ->
 4240:     ok.
 4241: 
 4242: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2("Welcome to SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 (i586)" ++ _) ->
 4243:     skip("TC does not work on platform");
 4244: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
 4245:     skip("Very slow VM");
 4246: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2(_) ->
 4247:     ok.

 4707:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4708:            fun() ->
 4709:                    is_not_windows(),
 4710:                    has_support_ipv4(),
 4711:                    traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond()
 4712:            end,
 4713:            fun() ->
 4714:                    ?TT(?SECS(60)),
 4715:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 4716:                                  proto  => tcp,
 4717:                                  msg    => Msg,
 4718:                                  num    => Num},
 4719:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(InitState)
 4720:            end).

 4724:     traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
 4725: 
 4726: traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond({unix, linux}, {M, _, _})
 4727:   when (M < 3) ->
 4728:     skip("TC may not work on this version");
 4729: traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond(_, _) ->
 4730:     ok.

 5005: 
 5006: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5007: 
 5008: %% Ping-Pong for TCP
 5009: 
 5010: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState) ->
 5011:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) -> socket:send(Sock, Data) end,
 5012:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> socket:recv(Sock, Sz) end,
 5013:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 5014:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 5015:                            },
 5016:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(InitState2).
 5017: 
 5018: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(#{domain := local} = InitState) ->
 5019:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> 
 5020:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 5021:                        %% On some platforms, the address
 5022:                        %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 5023:                        {ok, #{addr  := #{family := local},
 5024:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5025:                            {ok, Data};
 5026:                        {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 5027:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5028:                        %% On some platforms, the address
 5029:                        %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 5030:                        {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5031:                            {ok, Data};
 5032:                        {ok, Msg} ->
 5033:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5034:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5035:                            ERROR
 5036:                    end
 5037:            end,
 5038:     InitState2 = InitState#{recv => Recv},  % Receive function
 5039:     traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState2);
 5040: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(InitState) ->
 5041:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> 
 5042:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 5043:                        {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5044:                            {ok, Data};
 5045:                        {ok, Msg} ->
 5046:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5047:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5048:                            ERROR
 5049:                    end
 5050:            end,
 5051:     InitState2 = InitState#{recv => Recv},  % Receive function
 5052:     traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState2).
 5053: 
 5054: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState) ->
 5055:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) when is_binary(Data) ->
 5056:                    Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 5057:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
 5058:               (Sock, Data) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
 5059:                    Msg = #{iov => Data},
 5060:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 5061:            end,
 5062:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send}, % Send function
 5063:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(InitState2).
 5064: 
 5065: 
 5066: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
 5067:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
 5068:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
 5069: 		  ?SEV_IPRINT("RcvBuf is ~p (needs at least ~p)", 
 5070: 			      [RcvSz, 16+size(Msg)]),
 5071:                   if (RcvSz < size(Msg)) ->
 5072:                           NewRcvSz = 1024+size(Msg),
 5073:                           case socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, NewRcvSz) of
 5074: 			      ok ->
 5075: 				  ok;
 5076: 			      {error, enobufs} ->
 5077: 				  skip(?F("Change ~w buffer size (to ~w) "
 5078:                                           "not allowed", 
 5079:                                           [rcvbuf, NewRcvSz]));
 5080: 			      {error, Reason1} ->
 5081: 				  ?FAIL({rcvbuf, Reason1})
 5082: 			  end;
 5083:                      true ->
 5084:                           ok
 5085:                   end,
 5086:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
 5087: 		  ?SEV_IPRINT("SndBuf is ~p (needs at least ~p)", 
 5088: 			      [SndSz, 16+size(Msg)]),
 5089:                   if (SndSz < size(Msg)) ->
 5090:                           NewSndSz = 1024+size(Msg),
 5091:                           case socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, NewSndSz) of
 5092: 			      ok ->
 5093: 				  ok;
 5094: 			      {error, enobufs} ->
 5095: 				  skip(?F("Change ~w buffer size (to ~w) "
 5096:                                           "not allowed", 
 5097:                                           [sndbuf, NewSndSz]));
 5098: 			      {error, Reason2} ->
 5099: 				  ?FAIL({sndbuf, Reason2})
 5100: 			  end;
 5101:                      true ->
 5102:                           ok
 5103:                   end,
 5104:                   case os:type() of
 5105:                       {win32, nt} ->
 5106:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 12*1024);
 5107:                       _ ->
 5108:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, {12, 1024})
 5109:                   end
 5110:           end,
 5111:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
 5112: 
 5113: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream2(InitState) ->
 5114:     ServerSeq =
 5115:         [
 5116:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5117:          #{desc => "await start",
 5118:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5119:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5120:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 5121:                    end},
 5122:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5123:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5124:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5125:                            ok
 5126:                    end},
 5127: 
 5128:          %% *** Init part ***
 5129:          #{desc => "which local address",
 5130:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5131:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5132:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 5133:                    end},
 5134:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 5135:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 5136:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5137:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5138:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 5139:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 5140:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5141:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5142:                                    ERROR
 5143:                            end
 5144:                    end},
 5145:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5146:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 5147:                          lsock  := LSock,
 5148:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 5149:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5150:                                ok ->
 5151:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
 5152:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5153:                                    ERROR
 5154:                            end;
 5155:                       (#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 5156:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5157:                                ok ->
 5158:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 5159:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 5160:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 5161:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5162:                                    ERROR
 5163:                            end
 5164:                    end},
 5165:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
 5166:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
 5167:                            BufInit(LSock)
 5168:                    end},
 5169:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 5170:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 5171:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 5172:                    end},
 5173:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5174:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 5175:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 5176:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 5177:                            ok;
 5178:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, lport := Port}) ->
 5179:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 5180:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 5181:                            ok
 5182:                    end},
 5183: 
 5184:          %% The actual test
 5185:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 5186:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5187:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 5188:                    end},
 5189:          #{desc => "accept",
 5190:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5191:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 5192:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5193:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 5194:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5195:                                    ERROR
 5196:                            end
 5197:                    end},
 5198:          #{desc => "create handler",
 5199:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5200:                            Handler = tpp_tcp_handler_create(),
 5201:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
 5202:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
 5203:                    end},
 5204:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
 5205:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5206:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
 5207:                            ok
 5208:                    end},
 5209:          #{desc => "transfer connection socket ownership to handler",
 5210:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler, csock := Sock} = _State) ->
 5211:                            socket:setopt(Sock, otp, controlling_process, Handler)
 5212:                    end},
 5213:          #{desc => "start handler",
 5214:            cmd  => fun(#{handler  := Handler,
 5215:                          csock    := Sock,
 5216:                          send     := Send,
 5217:                          recv     := Recv} = _State) ->
 5218:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
 5219:                            ok
 5220:                    end},
 5221:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
 5222:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5223:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5224:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 5225:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5226:                                ok ->
 5227:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 5228:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5229:                                    ERROR
 5230:                            end
 5231:                    end},
 5232:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 5233:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5234:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 5235:                            ok
 5236:                    end},
 5237:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 5238:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5239:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5240:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
 5241:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 5242:                    end},
 5243:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
 5244:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5245:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
 5246:                            ok
 5247:                    end},
 5248:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
 5249:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5250:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5251:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
 5252:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5253:                                {ok, Result} ->
 5254:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
 5255:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 5256:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5257:                                    ERROR
 5258:                            end
 5259:                    end},
 5260:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
 5261:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
 5262:                          result := Result} = State) ->
 5263:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
 5264:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 5265:                    end},
 5266: 
 5267:          %% Termination
 5268:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5269:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5270:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5271:                                ok ->
 5272:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5273:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5274:                                    ERROR
 5275:                            end
 5276:                    end},
 5277:          #{desc => "stop handler",
 5278:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 5279:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 5280:                            ok
 5281:                    end},
 5282:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
 5283:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5284:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 5285:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 5286:                            {ok, State1}
 5287:                    end},
 5288:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 5289:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 5290:                          lsock    := Sock,
 5291:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 5292:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 5293:                            State1 =
 5294:                                unlink_path(Path,
 5295:                                            fun() -> 
 5296:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 5297:                                            end,
 5298:                                            fun() -> State end),
 5299:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 5300:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 5301:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 5302:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
 5303:                    end},
 5304: 
 5305:          %% *** We are done ***
 5306:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5307:         ],
 5308: 
 5309:     ClientSeq =
 5310:         [
 5311:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5312:          #{desc => "await start",
 5313:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5314:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5315:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 5316:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 5317:                    end},
 5318:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5319:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5320:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5321:                            ok
 5322:                    end},
 5323: 
 5324:          %% *** Init part ***
 5325:          #{desc => "create node",
 5326:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5327:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 5328:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 5329:                    end},
 5330:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 5331:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 5332:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 5333:                            ok
 5334:                    end},
 5335:          #{desc => "create remote client",
 5336:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 5337:                            Pid = tpp_tcp_client_create(Node),
 5338:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client created: ~p", [Pid]),
 5339:                            {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
 5340:                    end},
 5341:          #{desc => "monitor remote client",
 5342:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
 5343:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5344:                            ok
 5345:                    end},
 5346:          #{desc => "order remote client to start",
 5347:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := RClient,
 5348:                          proto     := Proto,
 5349:                          server_sa := ServerSA,
 5350:                          buf_init  := BufInit,
 5351:                          send      := Send,
 5352:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
 5353:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(RClient, 
 5354:                                                {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit,
 5355:                                                 Send, Recv}),
 5356:                            ok
 5357:                    end},
 5358:          #{desc => "await remote client ready",
 5359:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5360:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5361:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, init, 
 5362:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5363:                                ok ->
 5364:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client started"),
 5365:                                    ok;
 5366:                                {error, {unexpected_exit, _, {bind, eaddrnotavail = Reason}}} ->
 5367:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client bind failure:"
 5368:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5369:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5370:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5371:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("remote client failure:"
 5372:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5373:                                    ERROR
 5374:                            end
 5375:                    end},
 5376:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5377:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5378:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5379:                            ok
 5380:                    end},
 5381: 
 5382:          %% The actual test
 5383:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 5384:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5385:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5386:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect, 
 5387:                                                [{rclient, RClient}]),
 5388:                            ok
 5389:                    end},
 5390:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
 5391:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
 5392:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect),
 5393:                            ok
 5394:                    end},
 5395:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
 5396:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5397:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5398:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect, 
 5399:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
 5400:                    end},
 5401:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 5402:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5403:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 5404:                            ok
 5405:                    end},
 5406:          #{desc => "await continue (send)",
 5407:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5408:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5409:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, 
 5410:                                                send, 
 5411:                                                [{rclient, RClient}])
 5412:                    end},
 5413:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (send)",
 5414:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient,
 5415:                          msg     := Msg,
 5416:                          num     := Num} = State) ->
 5417:                            Data = {Msg, Num},
 5418:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, send, Data),
 5419:                            {ok, maps:remove(data, State)}
 5420:                    end},
 5421:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (send)",
 5422:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5423:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5424:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, send, 
 5425:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5426:                                {ok, Result} ->
 5427:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 5428:                                {error,
 5429:                                 {unexpected_exit, rclient, noconnection}} ->
 5430:                                    %% One guess is that the message is so
 5431:                                    %% "large" that the client node died on us.
 5432:                                    %% Or so "large" that the connection (to
 5433:                                    %% the node) fails/dies.
 5434:                                    %% Either way, we assume this is not actually
 5435:                                    %% related to what we are testing => skip
 5436:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("lost connection "
 5437:                                                "to remote client node => SKIP"),
 5438:                                    {skip, {rclient, noconnection}};
 5439:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5440:                                    ERROR
 5441:                            end
 5442:                    end},
 5443:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
 5444:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, result := Result} = State) ->
 5445:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send, Result),
 5446:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 5447:                    end},
 5448: 
 5449:          %% Termination
 5450:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5451:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
 5452:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5453:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
 5454:                                                      [{rclient, RClient}]) of
 5455:                                ok ->
 5456:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5457:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5458:                                    ERROR
 5459:                            end
 5460:                    end},
 5461:          #{desc => "stop remote client",
 5462:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
 5463:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(RClient),
 5464:                            ok
 5465:                    end},
 5466:          #{desc => "await remote client termination",
 5467:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5468:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(RClient),
 5469:                            State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
 5470:                            {ok, State1}
 5471:                    end},
 5472:          #{desc => "stop client node",
 5473:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
 5474:                            {ok,
 5475:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
 5476:                                 ok ->
 5477:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
 5478:                                 {error, Reason} ->
 5479:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 5480:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5481:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 5482:                             catch
 5483:                                 C:E:S ->
 5484:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 5485:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
 5486:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
 5487:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
 5488:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 5489:                             end}
 5490:                    end},
 5491:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
 5492:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State) ->
 5493:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
 5494:                            receive
 5495:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
 5496:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
 5497:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 5498:                                    {ok, State1}
 5499:                            end;
 5500:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
 5501:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
 5502:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 5503:                            {ok, State1}
 5504:                    end},
 5505: 
 5506:          %% *** We are done ***
 5507:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5508:         ],
 5509: 
 5510:     TesterSeq =
 5511:         [
 5512:          %% *** Init part ***
 5513:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 5514:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5515:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5516:                            ok
 5517:                    end},
 5518:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 5519:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5520:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5521:                            ok
 5522:                    end},
 5523: 
 5524:          %% Start the server
 5525:          #{desc => "order server start",
 5526:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5527:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 5528:                            ok
 5529:                    end},
 5530:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 5531:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5532:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 5533:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 5534:                    end},
 5535: 
 5536:          %% Start the client
 5537:          #{desc => "order client start",
 5538:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
 5539:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
 5540:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
 5541:                            ok
 5542:                    end},
 5543:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 5544:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5545:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 5546:                    end},
 5547:  
 5548:          %% The actual test
 5549:          #{desc => "order server continue (accept)",
 5550:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5551:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
 5552:                            ok
 5553:                    end},
 5554:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5555:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
 5556:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5557:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
 5558:                            ok
 5559:                    end},
 5560:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 5561:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5562:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 5563:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept,
 5564:                                             [{client, Client}]),
 5565:                            ok
 5566:                    end},
 5567:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 5568:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5569:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 5570:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect, 
 5571:                                             [{server, Server}])
 5572:                    end},
 5573:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 5574:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5575:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 5576:                            ok
 5577:                    end},
 5578:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5579:          #{desc => "order client continue (send)",
 5580:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5581:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send),
 5582:                            ok
 5583:                    end},
 5584:          #{desc => "await client ready (send)",
 5585:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5586:                          client := Client} = State) ->
 5587:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send, 
 5588:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
 5589:                                {ok, {_, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 5590:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("client result: "
 5591:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 5592:                                    {ok, State#{client_result => Result}};
 5593:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 5594:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("client result: "
 5595:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 5596:                                    {error, {invalid_client_result, BadResult}};
 5597:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5598:                                    ERROR
 5599:                            end
 5600:                    end},
 5601:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv)",
 5602:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5603:                          client := Client,
 5604:                          num    := Num} = State) ->
 5605:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv,
 5606:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
 5607:                                {ok, {Num, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 5608:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("server result: "
 5609:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 5610:                                    Result2 = erlang:delete_element(1, Result),
 5611:                                    {ok, State#{server_result => Result2}};
 5612:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 5613:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bad server result: "
 5614:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 5615:                                    {error, {invalid_server_result, BadResult}};
 5616:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5617:                                    ERROR
 5618:                            end
 5619:                    end},
 5620:          #{desc => "present result",
 5621:            cmd  => fun(#{server_result := SRes,
 5622:                          client_result := CRes,
 5623:                          num           := Num} = State) ->
 5624:                            {SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop} = SRes,
 5625:                            {CSent, CReceived, _, CStart, CStop} = CRes,
 5626:                            STime = tdiff(SStart, SStop),
 5627:                            CTime = tdiff(CStart, CStop),
 5628:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("process result data:"
 5629:                                        "~n   Num:          ~p"
 5630:                                        "~n   Server Sent:  ~p"
 5631:                                        "~n   Server Recv:  ~p"
 5632:                                        "~n   Server Start: ~p"
 5633:                                        "~n   Server Stop:  ~p"
 5634:                                        "~n   Server Time:  ~p"
 5635:                                        "~n   Client Sent:  ~p"
 5636:                                        "~n   Client Recv:  ~p"
 5637:                                        "~n   Client Start: ~p"
 5638:                                        "~n   Client Stop:  ~p"
 5639:                                        "~n   Client Time:  ~p",
 5640:                                        [Num,
 5641:                                         SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop,
 5642:                                         STime,
 5643:                                         CSent, CReceived, CStart, CStop,
 5644:                                         CTime]),
 5645:                            if
 5646:                                (STime =:= 0) orelse
 5647:                                (CTime =:= 0) ->
 5648:                                    {skip,
 5649:                                     ?F("Invalid exec time(s): ~w , ~w",
 5650:                                        [STime, CTime])};
 5651:                                true ->
 5652:                                    %% Note that the sizes we are counting is 
 5653:                                    %% only the "data" part of the messages.
 5654:                                    %% There is also fixed header for each
 5655:                                    %% message, which of course is small for
 5656:                                    %% the large messages, but comparatively
 5657:                                    %% big for the small messages!
 5658:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
 5659:                                       "Results: ~w messages exchanged"
 5660:                                       "~n   Server: ~w msec"
 5661:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 5662:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 5663:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 5664:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received"
 5665:                                       "~n   Client: ~w msec"
 5666:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 5667:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 5668:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 5669:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received",
 5670:                                       [Num,
 5671:                                        STime,
 5672:                                        STime / Num,
 5673:                                        Num / STime,
 5674:                                        SSent div STime,
 5675:                                        SReceived div STime,
 5676:                                        CTime,
 5677:                                        CTime / Num,
 5678:                                        Num / CTime,
 5679:                                        CSent div CTime,
 5680:                                        CReceived div CTime]),
 5681:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server_result, State),
 5682:                                    State2 = maps:remove(client_result, State1),
 5683:                                    {ok, State2}
 5684:                            end
 5685:                    end},
 5686: 
 5687:          %% Terminations
 5688:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 5689:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5690:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5691:                            ok
 5692:                    end},
 5693:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 5694:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 5695:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 5696:                                ok ->
 5697:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 5698:                                    {ok, State1};
 5699:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5700:                                    ERROR
 5701:                            end
 5702:                    end},
 5703:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 5704:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5705:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5706:                            ok
 5707:                    end},
 5708:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 5709:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5710:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 5711:                                ok ->
 5712:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 5713:                                    {ok, State1};
 5714:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5715:                                    ERROR
 5716:                            end
 5717:                    end},
 5718: 
 5719: 
 5720:          %% *** We are done ***
 5721:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5722:         ],
 5723: 
 5724:     i("start server evaluator"),
 5725:     ServerInitState = #{domain   => maps:get(domain,   InitState),
 5726:                         proto    => maps:get(proto,    InitState),
 5727:                         recv     => maps:get(recv,     InitState),
 5728:                         send     => maps:get(send,     InitState),
 5729:                         buf_init => maps:get(buf_init, InitState)},
 5730:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 5731: 
 5732:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 5733:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 5734:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 5735: 
 5736:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 5737:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 5738:                         client => Client#ev.pid,
 5739:                         num    => maps:get(num, InitState)},
 5740:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 5741: 
 5742:     i("await evaluator"),
 5743:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 5744:     
 5745: 
 5746: tpp_tcp_handler_create() ->
 5747:     Self = self(),
 5748:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> tpp_tcp_handler(Self) end).
 5749: 
 5750: tpp_tcp_handler(Parent) ->
 5751:     tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent),
 5752:     {Sock, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent),
 5753:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 5754:     tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, recv),
 5755:     Result = tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv),
 5756:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, recv, Result),
 5757:     Reason = tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
 5758:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 5759:     exit(Reason).
 5760: 
 5761: tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent) ->
 5762:     put(sname, "handler"),
 5763:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 5764:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 5765:     ok.
 5766: 
 5767: tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent) ->
 5768:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 5769:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 5770: 
 5771: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5772:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5773:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 5774: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 5775:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5776:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 5777: 
 5778: tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5779:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5780:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 5781:         ok ->
 5782:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 5783:             ok;
 5784:         {error, Reason} ->
 5785:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 5786:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 5787:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 5788:     end.
 5789: 
 5790: tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 5791:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 5792:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 5793:         ok ->
 5794:             ok;
 5795:         {error, Reason} ->
 5796:             Reason
 5797:     end.
 5798: 
 5799: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv) ->
 5800:     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, 0, 0, 0, undefined).
 5801: 
 5802: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 5803:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
 5804:     case tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) of
 5805:         {ok, Msg, RecvSz} ->
 5806:             NewStart = if (Start =:= undefined) -> ?SLIB:timestamp(); 
 5807:                           true -> Start end,
 5808:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] received - now try send", [N]),
 5809:             case tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Msg) of
 5810:                 {ok, SendSz} ->
 5811:                     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 5812:                                                       N+1,
 5813:                                                       Sent+SendSz,
 5814:                                                       Received+RecvSz,
 5815:                                                       NewStart);
 5816:                 {error, SReason} ->
 5817:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w): ~p", [N, SReason]),
 5818:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 5819:             end;
 5820:         {error, closed} ->
 5821:             ?SEV_IPRINT("closed - we are done: ~w, ~w, ~w", [N, Sent, Received]),
 5822:             Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5823:             {N, Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
 5824:         {error, RReason} ->
 5825:             ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w): ~p", [N, RReason]),
 5826:             exit({recv, RReason, N})
 5827:     end.
 5828:             
 5829: %% The (remote) client process
 5830: 
 5831: tpp_tcp_client_create(Node) ->
 5832:     Self = self(),
 5833:     Fun  = fun() -> tpp_tcp_client(Self) end,
 5834:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 5835: 
 5836: tpp_tcp_client(Parent) ->
 5837:     tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent),
 5838:     {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
 5839:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 5840:     Sock     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit),
 5841:     Path     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain),
 5842:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 5843:     tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
 5844:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
 5845:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
 5846:     {InitMsg, Num} = tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, send),
 5847:     Result = tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num),
 5848:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, send, Result),
 5849:     Reason = tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
 5850:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path),
 5851:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 5852:     exit(Reason).
 5853: 
 5854: tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
 5855:     put(sname, "rclient"),
 5856:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 5857:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 5858:     ok.
 5859: 
 5860: tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
 5861:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 5862:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 5863: 
 5864: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5865:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5866:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 5867: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 5868:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p): ~p", [Slogan, Extra]),
 5869:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 5870: 
 5871: tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5872:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5873:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 5874:         ok ->
 5875:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 5876:             ok;
 5877:         {ok, Data} ->
 5878:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok with data", [Slogan]),
 5879:             Data;
 5880:         {error, Reason} ->
 5881:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 5882:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 5883:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 5884:     end.
 5885: 
 5886: tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 5887:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 5888:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 5889:         ok ->
 5890:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: normal"),
 5891:             normal;
 5892:         {error, Reason} ->
 5893:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: ~w", [Reason]),
 5894:             Reason
 5895:     end.
 5896: 
 5897: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num) ->
 5898:     Start = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5899:     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, 
 5900:                                      Num, 0, 0, 0, Start).
 5901: 
 5902: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, _Send, _Recv, _Msg,
 5903:                                  Num, Num, Sent, Received,
 5904:                                  Start) ->
 5905:     Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5906:     Info = socket:info(Sock),
 5907:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 5908:         ok ->
 5909:             {Sent, Received, Info, Start, Stop};
 5910:         {error, Reason} ->
 5911:             exit({failed_closing, Reason})
 5912:     end;
 5913: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, Data, 
 5914:                                  Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 5915:     %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) try send ~w", [Num,N,size(Data)]),
 5916:     case tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) of
 5917:         {ok, SendSz} ->
 5918:             %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) sent - "
 5919:             %%   "now try recv", [Num,N]),
 5920:             case tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
 5921:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz} ->
 5922:                     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 5923:                                                      NewData, Num, N+1,
 5924:                                                      Sent+SendSz, 
 5925:                                                      Received+RecvSz, 
 5926:                                                      Start);
 5927:                 {error, RReason} ->
 5928:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p: "
 5929:                                 "~n   ~p", [N, Num, RReason, ?MQ()]),
 5930:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
 5931:             end;
 5932:         {error, SReason} ->
 5933:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p"
 5934:                         "~n   ~p", [N, Num, SReason, ?MQ()]),
 5935:             case SReason of
 5936:                 emsgsize ->
 5937:                     exit({send, SReason, N, byte_size(Data)});
 5938:                 _ ->
 5939:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 5940:             end
 5941:     end.
 5942: 
 5943: tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit) ->
 5944:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5945:         {ok, Sock} ->
 5946:             ok = BufInit(Sock),
 5947:             Sock;
 5948:         {error, Reason} ->
 5949:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 5950:     end.
 5951: 
 5952: tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 5953:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5954:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5955:         ok ->
 5956:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 5957:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
 5958:                     Path;
 5959:                 {ok, _} ->
 5960:                     undefined;
 5961:                 {error, Reason1} ->
 5962:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
 5963:             end;
 5964:         {error, Reason2} ->
 5965:             exit({bind, Reason2})
 5966:     end.
 5967: 
 5968: tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
 5969:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
 5970:         ok ->
 5971:             ok;
 5972:         {error, Reason} ->
 5973:             exit({connect, Reason})
 5974:     end.
 5975: 
 5976: tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path) ->
 5977:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 5978:         ok ->
 5979:             unlink_path(Path),
 5980:             ok;
 5981:         {error, closed} ->
 5982:             ok;
 5983:         {error, Reason} ->
 5984:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
 5985:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 5986:             unlink_path(Path),
 5987:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 5988:     end.
 5989: 
 5990:     
 5991:     
 5992: -define(TPP_REQUEST, 1).
 5993: -define(TPP_REPLY,   2).
 5994: 
 5995: tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) ->
 5996:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REQUEST).
 5997: 
 5998: tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) ->
 5999:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REPLY).
 6000: 
 6001: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag) ->
 6002:     case Recv(Sock, 0) of
 6003:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} 
 6004:           when (Sz =:= size(Data)) ->
 6005:             %% We got it all
 6006:             {ok, Data, size(Msg)};
 6007:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} ->
 6008:             Remains = Sz - size(Data),
 6009:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remains, size(Msg), [Data]);
 6010:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, _/binary>>} ->
 6011:             {error, {invalid_msg_tag, Tag}};
 6012:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
 6013:             ERROR
 6014:     end.
 6015: 
 6016: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remaining, AccSz, Acc) ->
 6017:     case Recv(Sock, Remaining) of
 6018:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining =:= size(Data)) ->
 6019:             %% We got the rest
 6020:             TotSz = AccSz + size(Data),
 6021:             {ok, erlang:iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse([Data | Acc])), TotSz};
 6022:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining > size(Data)) ->
 6023:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, 
 6024:                          Remaining - size(Data), AccSz + size(Data),     
 6025:                          [Data | Acc]);
 6026:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
 6027:             ERROR
 6028:     end.
 6029:                                                          
 6030:             
 6031: tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) ->
 6032:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REQUEST, Data).
 6033: 
 6034: tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Data) ->
 6035:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REPLY, Data).
 6036: 
 6037: tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, Tag, Data) ->
 6038:     DataSz = size(Data),
 6039:     Msg    = <<Tag:32/integer, DataSz:32/integer, Data/binary>>,
 6040:     tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, 0).
 6041: 
 6042: tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, AccSz) when is_binary(Msg) ->
 6043:     case Send(Sock, Msg) of
 6044:         ok ->
 6045:             {ok, AccSz+size(Msg)};
 6046:         {ok, Rest} -> % This is an IOVec
 6047:             RestBin = list_to_binary(Rest),
 6048:             tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, RestBin, AccSz+(size(Msg)-size(RestBin)));
 6049:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6050:             ERROR
 6051:     end.
 6052:     
 6053: 
 6054: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6055: 
 6056: %% Ping-Pong for UDP
 6057: 
 6058: traffic_ping_pong_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp(InitState) ->
 6059:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6060:                    socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 6061:            end,
 6062:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)         ->
 6063:                    socket:recvfrom(Sock, Sz)
 6064:            end,
 6065:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 6066:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 6067:                            },
 6068:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
 6069: 
 6070: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp(InitState) ->
 6071:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) when is_binary(Data) ->
 6072:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => [Data]},
 6073:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
 6074:               (Sock, Data, Dest) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
 6075:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => Data},
 6076:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 6077:            end,
 6078:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   ->
 6079:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 6080:                        {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 6081:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
 6082:                            {ok, {Source, Data}};
 6083:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6084:                            ERROR
 6085:                    end
 6086:            end,
 6087:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 6088:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 6089:                            },
 6090:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
 6091: 
 6092: 
 6093: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
 6094:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
 6095:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
 6096:                   if (RcvSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6097:                           i("adjust socket rcvbuf buffer size"),
 6098:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6099:                      true ->
 6100:                           ok
 6101:                   end,
 6102:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
 6103:                   if (SndSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6104:                           i("adjust socket sndbuf buffer size"),
 6105:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6106:                      true ->
 6107:                           ok
 6108:                   end,
 6109:                   {ok, OtpRcvBuf} = socket:getopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf),
 6110:                   if
 6111:                       (OtpRcvBuf =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6112:                           i("adjust otp rcvbuf buffer size"),
 6113:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6114:                       true ->
 6115:                           ok
 6116:                   end
 6117:           end,
 6118:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
 6119: 
 6120: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState) ->
 6121:     ServerSeq =
 6122:         [
 6123:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6124:          #{desc => "await start",
 6125:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6126:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6127:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6128:                    end},
 6129:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6130:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6131:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6132:                            ok
 6133:                    end},
 6134: 
 6135:          %% *** Init part ***
 6136:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6137:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6138:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6139:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 6140:                    end},
 6141:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6142:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 6143:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 6144:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6145:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6146:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6147:                                    ERROR
 6148:                            end
 6149:                    end},
 6150:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6151:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6152:                          sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6153:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6154:                                ok ->
 6155:                                    ok;
 6156:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6157:                                    ERROR
 6158:                            end;
 6159:                       (#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 6160:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6161:                                ok ->
 6162:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 6163:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 6164:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6165:                                    ERROR
 6166:                            end
 6167:                    end},
 6168:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
 6169:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
 6170:                            BufInit(Sock)
 6171:                    end},
 6172:          #{desc => "create handler",
 6173:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6174:                            Handler = tpp_udp_server_handler_create(),
 6175:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
 6176:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
 6177:                    end},
 6178:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
 6179:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6180:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
 6181:                            ok
 6182:                    end},
 6183:          #{desc => "start handler",
 6184:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6185:                          sock    := Sock,
 6186:                          send    := Send,
 6187:                          recv    := Recv} = _State) ->
 6188:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
 6189:                            ok
 6190:                    end},
 6191:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
 6192:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6193:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6194:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 6195:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6196:                                ok ->
 6197:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 6198:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6199:                                    ERROR
 6200:                            end
 6201:                    end},
 6202:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6203:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6204:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 6205:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 6206:                            ok;
 6207:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
 6208:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6209:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 6210:                            ok
 6211:                    end},
 6212: 
 6213:          %% The actual test
 6214:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 6215:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6216:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6217:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
 6218:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6219:                    end},
 6220:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
 6221:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6222:                          sock    := _Sock} = _State) ->
 6223:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6224:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
 6225:                            ok
 6226:                    end},
 6227:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 6228:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6229:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6230:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close, 
 6231:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6232:                    end},
 6233: 
 6234:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6235: 
 6236:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6237:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6238:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6239:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6240:                                ok ->
 6241:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 6242:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6243:                                    ERROR
 6244:                            end
 6245:                    end},
 6246:          #{desc => "(maybe) unlink socket",
 6247:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 6248:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6249:                            unlink_path(Path,
 6250:                                        fun() ->
 6251:                                                {ok, maps:remove(local_sa, State)}
 6252:                                        end,
 6253:                                        fun() ->
 6254:                                                ok
 6255:                                        end);
 6256:                       (_) ->
 6257:                            ok
 6258:                    end},
 6259:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 6260:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6261:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 6262:                            ok
 6263:                    end},
 6264:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
 6265:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6266:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6267:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
 6268:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6269:                                {ok, Result} ->
 6270:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
 6271:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 6272:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6273:                                    ERROR
 6274:                            end
 6275:                    end},
 6276:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
 6277:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
 6278:                          result := Result} = State) ->
 6279:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
 6280:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 6281:                    end},
 6282: 
 6283:          %% Termination
 6284:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 6285:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6286:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6287:                                ok ->
 6288:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6289:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6290:                                    ERROR
 6291:                            end
 6292:                    end},
 6293:          #{desc => "stop handler",
 6294:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 6295:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 6296:                            ok
 6297:                    end},
 6298:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
 6299:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6300:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 6301:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 6302:                            {ok, State1}
 6303:                    end},
 6304: 
 6305:          %% *** We are done ***
 6306:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6307:         ],
 6308: 
 6309:     ClientSeq =
 6310:         [
 6311:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6312:          #{desc => "await start",
 6313:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6314:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6315:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 6316:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 6317:                    end},
 6318:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6319:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6320:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6321:                            ok
 6322:                    end},
 6323: 
 6324:          %% *** Init part ***
 6325:          #{desc => "create node",
 6326:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6327:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 6328:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 6329:                    end},
 6330:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 6331:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 6332:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 6333:                            ok
 6334:                    end},
 6335:          #{desc => "create (remote) handler",
 6336:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 6337:                            Pid = tpp_udp_client_handler_create(Node),
 6338:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Pid]),
 6339:                            {ok, State#{handler => Pid}}
 6340:                    end},
 6341:          #{desc => "monitor remote handler",
